# W6512-23B002 Expandable Workshop Containers
## Announcement Details
- **Reference Number**: WS4590181812
- **Solicitation Number**: WS4590181812
- **Publication Date**: May 29, 2024
- **Tender Closing Date**: June 25, 2024 (14:00:00)
- **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
- **UNSPSC**: Prefabricated buildings and structures (95140000)

## Contractual Details
- **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **End-User**: Department of National Defence (DND)
- **Regions of Delivery**: Saguenay, Quebec
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: June 27, 2024
- **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2025
- **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive (Open bidding)

## Bid Details
- **Tender Status**: Expiring
- **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- **Bid Description**: The bidding entity must submit all supporting documentation and bid submission by the latest deadline (2 PM EDT, June 25, 2024). Bids submitted after this deadline will be declared non-responsive.

## Contact Details
- **Contracting Officer**: Pierre-Alexandre Simard
- **Email**: pierre-alexeandre.simard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
- **URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19830980?extsite=MTk4MzA5ODBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
